articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Flails S. Korea's War Exercises
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Flails S. Korea's War Exercises
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime kicked off an anti-DPRK war rehearsal, 2014 Hoguk, throughout south Korea on Monday in the plea of "annual exercises".
					Taking part in the large-scale military rehearsal to be staged till November 21 are at least 330,000 troops, more than four times those involved in the past, and 23,000 pieces of mobile equipment, 60 warships and various kinds of aircraft. During the rehearsal they will conduct such military drills as "frontline corps' drill for carrying out operation plan", "drill for defending northwestern islands", "naval drill for infiltration into coast" and "combined landing drill". And they will reportedly stage several joint exercises with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 In this regard, the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued its information bulletin No. 1079 on Tuesday, which said the rehearsal is a preliminary war, nuclear test war for aggression on the DPRK in light of its scale and content.
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet warmongers assert that the rehearsal is "aimed to establish the strictest military posture against someone's provocation", the bulletin pointed out, saying:
					
					 The puppet group had much talked about "high-level contact" until recently but unilaterally scuppered it. And now it is staging the Hoguk rehearsal in the largest scale. This clearly proved that the south Korean authorities do not hope for dialogue in actuality but has attempted to use it as a camouflage in order to escalate confrontation and war moves.
					
					 The reality shows that the south Korean puppet group is only keen on anti-DPRK war exercises, making in succession "local provocations" and crying out that they will not rule out a total war.
					
					 Through the rehearsal, the group seeks to justify the criminal indefinite extension of the transfer of the right to wartime operation control, raise its troops' morale sagged due to serious breaches of military discipline and use them as a shock brigade for igniting a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will mercilessly wipe out the south Korean puppet forces if they provoke the DPRK even a bit.

articles.title: Polish Embassy Gives Reception
articles.content:
Polish Embassy Gives Reception
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The Polish embassy here gave a reception on Wednesday on the occasion of the independence day of Poland.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Krzysztof Ciebien and his embassy officials were present. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Palestinian Diplomats Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Palestinian Diplomats Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, and a staff member of his embassy visited the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum on Wednesday on the occasions of the 26th anniversary of the proclamation of the State of Palestine and the year of world solidarity  with the Palestinian people.
					 The guests laid a bouquet before the mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They went round historic relics, being briefed on the undying feats Kim Il Sung, an outstanding strategist and invincible and iron-willed commander, performed by arousing the service personnel and people of the DPRK to win a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Delegation Meets with Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Delegation Meets with Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Choe Il Gyong, department director of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, met with Choe Thae Guk, pro-reunification patriotic fighter and former unconverted long-term prisoner, on Wednesday.
					Choe Thae Guk said that he waged an indomitable struggle against the enemy behind bars for decades.
					
					His profound trust in the party and the leader served as a basic source that helped him remain a man of dauntless spirit at the crossroads of life and death, he said, adding:
					
					He enjoyed a worthwhile life as an indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter and DPRK hero under the loving care of leader Kim Jong Il and is still leading a happy life under the warm care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Choe Il Gyong said that he was greatly inspired by the fighting spirit of the pro-reunification patriotic fighters who remained true to their revolutionary principle to the last.
					
					He pledged to dynamically follow the road of Juche and patriotism, rallied close around Kim Jong Un, who is creditably carrying forward and accomplishing the cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					At the meeting, there was an art performance given by former unconverted long-term prisoners and their families and members of the delegation.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Wins Gold Medal in 2014 World Weightlifting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Wins Gold Medal in 2014 World Weightlifting Championship
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Hwa, a DPRK woman weightlifter, won a gold in the women's 58kg category event of the 2014 World Weightlifting Championship.
					 She lifted 133kg in the clean and jerk Nov. 11 to come first and placed second in total points to grab a silver.
					
					 DPRK weightlifter Kim Myong Hyok came third in the clean and jerk and in total points in the 69kg category event held on Nov. 10.

articles.title: Promising Economic Development Zones in DPRK
articles.content:
Promising Economic Development Zones in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A work has been pushed forward in the DPRK to set up economic development zone (EDZ) in every province of the country.
					 In this regard, Yun Yong Sok, vice-director-general of the General Bureau for State Economic Development of the Ministry of Foreign Trade, told KCNA:
					
					 The DPRK government decided to set up EDZ in every province and municipality conducive to improving its people's standard of living, developing the national economy and boosting the economic exchange with foreign countries.
					
					 Some areas in Unjong District of Pyongyang City, Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province and Kangryong County of South Hwanghae Province have already announced to be high-tech development park, international economic zone and international green model zone.
					
					 EDZs will take their shapes in Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province, Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province, Manpho City of Jagang Province and Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province and industrial development zones in Hamhung City of South Hamgyong Province, Wonsan City of Kangwon Province, Wiwon County of Jagang Province and Chongnam District of South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Some areas in Orang County of North Hamgyong Province, Pukchong County of South Hamgyong Province and Sukchon County of South Phyongan Province will be turned into agricultural development zones and some areas in Songrim City of North Hwanghae Province and Waudo District of Nampho City into export processing zones.
					
					 On the other hand, Chongsu tourist development zone opened recently while other tourist zones will be set up in Onsong County of North Hamgyong Province and Sinphyong County of North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 All those development projects would be carried out by means of establishing joint venture with foreign companies or individual investors or setting up separate enterprises.
					
					 Foreign companies and individuals can invest in any development zones they hope for.
					
					 Now those zones in the DPRK are drawing great attention of governments and investors of Asian and European countries.

articles.title: DPRK Educators Resolved to Repay WPK's Loving Care
articles.content:
DPRK Educators Resolved to Repay WPK's Loving Care
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK boast of their happy life at twin skyscraping apartment houses, recently built on the bank of the River Taedong under the deep care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Those sailing ship-styled apartment houses have such welfare service facilities as shop, restaurant, e-library and hairdresser's shop on the ground floor, and there are even resting places at their 30th floors. Each flat is furnished with all necessary living things.
					
					 Deeply moved by such warm solicitude of the WPK, their occupants and all other educators are now hardening their will to devote their all to the educational work for posterity.
					
					 Pak Jae Song, living at flat No. 2 on the 19th floor of block No. 2, told KCNA:
					
					 It is only our socialist system centered on the popular masses that grants such palatial houses to ordinary intellectuals free of charge.
					
					 This is just a luxurious and highly civilized life we are leading under socialism, I dare say.
					
					 The educators and scientists at my university are filled with the firm resolve to devote all their life to the education of the rising generations, true to the Party's idea of attaching importance to science.

articles.title: Rich Crop of Persimmon in Chonsam Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Rich Crop of Persimmon in Chonsam Co-op Farm
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The Chonsam Co-op Farm in Anbyon County, Kangwon Province in the DPRK had a bumper harvest of persimmon this year.
					 In this regard, KCNA met U Jong Suk, chairwoman of the management board of the co-op farm.
					
					 She said:
					
					 The persimmon yield of this year has doubled in comparison with last year.
					
					 The rich crop would have been unthinkable without the loving care shown by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In their lifetime, they visited the farm on several occasions, underscored the need to plant more persimmon trees for increased yield and indicated the ways and methods to do so.
					
					 In hearty response to their instructions, all peasants turned out in the work to plant persimmon trees on hills and gardens while tending persimmon trees in a scientific way.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Leadership Is Driving Force of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Leadership Is Driving Force of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial article says that the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un is the tremendous driving force of the great Paektusan nation full of dynamism.
					 The Workers' Party of Korea led by him will steer the country and the revolution to a victory and translate all dreams and ideals of the people into realities, the article says, adding:
					
					 The WPK's leadership is a powerful driving force for paving the way for the Korean revolution on the snow-covered path in the new era. It serves as an ever-victorious treasured sword for bringing earlier the final victory in the struggle to defend socialism and an engine for making a leap forward and changes.
					
					 The WPK's leadership, at the same time, serves as a motive power for enthusiasm and miracles as it makes the hearts of all service personnel and people burn with warm loving care.
					
					 The new century of Juche Korea is an untrodden path along which they have to weather manifold difficulties and trials. Which way the DPRK should follow in the era. This   is a fundamental issue decisive of setback and victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Un inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on the New Year 2012. This was a historic event that gave an answer to the urgent question raised by the era and revolution.
					
					 The option of independence, Songun and socialism is a historic event that guarantees an eternal victory and leaping progress of Juche Korea.
					
					 The struggle to defend Korean-style socialism in the new century means all-out confrontation in the true sense of the word as confrontation and competition with imperialism are taking place in all fabrics of social life without any front and rear and all-out struggle requiring the involvement of all mental and physical power of the state.
					
					 The WPK's leadership demonstrating one victory after another over the aggressor forces of imperialism results in matchless strength to make a breakthrough towards defending socialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's love for the people is his noble inborn disposition and represents the nature of the WPK.
					
					 The DPRK remains powerful not because of huge wealth or cutting-edge weapons but because of warm love for the people. The power based on this love is everlasting just as the force of love lives on forever as long as human beings exist.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to enjoy all glories under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The leadership supported and upheld by the people means the greatest justice and the strongest force. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea will more dynamically advance for the final victory in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation while enshrining this immutable truth.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il and Korean People Are Harmonious Whole: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and Korean People Are Harmonious Whole: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il and the Korean people form an eternal harmonious whole and he will always live as the outstanding leader of the revolution and the sun of Songun Korea of Juche for all ages. This is the immutable truth taught by the three year-long heroic advance. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					 The harmonious whole between Kim Jong Il and the Korean people is the sincerest and most solid unity achieved in the course of the protracted historical struggle and the do-or-die struggles on the road of the Songun revolution, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il created an immortal heroic epic, weathering the stern tempests of the revolution together with the army and people for more than half a century. Attracted by the extraordinary personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man, the people and the army formed a harmonious whole with him and won a shining victory in defending socialism and building a thriving nation by dint of the single-minded unity.
					
					 The country has produced lots of prototypes of the times and persons of meritorious services who devoted their lives to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the generations to come, irrespective of whether they are rewarded or not. This clearly indicates the noble traits of the Korean people who embody Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on life.
					
					 The above-said harmonious whole has been given steady continuity over the past three years. This is ascribable to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His leadership full of intense loyalty to the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il has been a fundamental source that helped all party members, service personnel and people enshrine the faith that Kim Jong Il is always with us.
					
					 Through the three year-long struggle the army and people of the country have keenly realized that the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation will be in store for them when  they single-mindedly remain loyal to the idea and leadership of the Marshal, rallied close around him.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Hoguk Military Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Hoguk Military Drills
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Hoguk war exercises that were kicked off in south Korea on Nov. 10 targeting the DPRK are deliberate provocations to escalate the military confrontation and push the north-south relations to a catastrophe, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary.
					 Whenever the puppet forces staged Hoguk and other war exercises against the DPRK, the military confrontation between the north and the south was escalated and a touch-and-go situation created on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet group is now staging madcap war drills under the pretext of coping with the "north's provocation of a local war" and "its all-out war".
					
					 The second corps of the puppet army launched field mobile exercises in the areas of Chunchon and Hwachon in south Korean Kangwon Province with huge troops involved. The eighth corps is conducting drills for carrying out an operational plan in the coastal areas of six cities and counties in the province. Other corps are involved in Hoguk.
					
					 No one can vouch that they will not spill over into a war against the DPRK any moment as puppet warmongers are busy with saber-rattling in all areas along the Military Demarcation Line to invade it.
					
					 If they fire even a single shell at the territory of the DPRK, its army and people will mercilessly punish them as they had already warned.
					
					 The puppet forces should stop the adventurous Hoguk war exercises at once, keenly aware of the gravity of the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Gangsters' Hoguk War Drills under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Gangsters' Hoguk War Drills under Fire
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News on Nov. 9 carried an article denouncing the puppet military authorities for escalating Hoguk war drills against the north in a bid to increase the danger of a war. 
					 The article recalled that largest-ever military forces are involved in the drills which started Monday. 
					
					 The drills which have been staged since 1996 were conducted with main emphasis on joint and combined exercises to carry out operation plans at their beginning, the article noted, and went on:.
					
					 From 2008 corps-level mobile drills were combined with exercises for implementing operation plans and they were escalated into mobile exercises of large units in the front area. It was against this backdrop that the Yonphyong Island shelling took place in 2010. 
					
					 The subsequent period witnessed a sharp increase in the scale of the drills. This year's are the largest-ever. 
					
					 There is concern that the Yonphyong Island shelling may reoccur. 
					
					 Warning that the drills are now under way under the worst situation where the south-north relations are at rock bottom due to the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations, in particular, the article urged the military authorities to behave with reason.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Poor Diplomacy Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Poor Diplomacy Censured
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- An editorial of the south Korean paper Hangyore denounced the puppet authorities for pursuing bankrupt diplomacy.
					 There is increasing international tendency to get in touch with the north whereas south Korea has a growing pile of evils, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 Its agreement made with the U.S. to indefinitely extend the transfer of the right to the wartime operation control has only deepened internal division.
					
					 The issue of allowing the deployment of THAAD drew strong censure from other countries.
					
					 South Korea's poor diplomacy is an inevitable product of such improper policies as "confidence-building process".
					
					 The authorities should consider the improvement of the relations with the north as a starting point for settling the prevailing situation.
					
					 Hanguk Ilbo also published an editorial in which it said south Korea's diplomacy is facing a crisis, adding that now is time for the "government" to reexamine the principles concerning the south-north relations.

articles.title: Koreans' Organization in Germany Introduces Large Apple Orchards at Foot of Chol Pass
articles.content:
Koreans' Organization in Germany Introduces Large Apple Orchards at Foot of Chol Pass
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany in an article posted on a homepage on November 3 introduced a vast expanse of apple orchards at the foot of Chol Pass.
					 The article said there is Chol Pass near the Military Demarcation Line that divides the Korean Peninsula into the north and the south, adding the area is associated with the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il crossed the steep Chol Pass several times during the days of providing Songun leadership to the units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 A large fruit farm appeared at the foot of Chol Pass symbolic of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 It is spectacular to enjoy a panoramic view of the farm.
					
					 It was Kim Jong Il who unrolled a plan to build such a socialist land of bliss.
					
					 This plan was successfully translated into a reality by Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					
					 The appearance of such vast apple orchards at the foot of Chol Pass has a very profound bearing on the international community.
					
					 The Chol Pass means Songun while the apple orchards mean luxury and wealth under socialism. In other words, the apple orchards most vividly indicate the appearance of the happy people who will fully enjoy luxury and wealth under socialism thanks to Songun.
					
					 The apple orchards at the foot of Chol Pass clearly prove before the world and history the validity of Songun and truth that it is quite possible to bring the people a happy life if the capability for self-defence is bolstered up, no matter how undisguised the imperialists may become in their moves for aggression.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The November issue of the Romanian newspaper Romania Muncitoare carried the gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction".
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it is the fundamental principle to be maintained in accomplishing the socialist cause to preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction and indicates the tasks and ways for doing so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" on its website on October 30.
					 The work, published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the Juche-oriented theory of socialism is the most scientific and vital one and the principled issues arising in defending and preserving socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in France
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A French committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on November 3.
					 Andre Aubry, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events in praise of Kim Jong Il's noble revolutionary career and immortal exploits on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on November 4.
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, was elected chairwoman of the memorial committee.
					
					 The committee set the days from November 3 to December 17 as a memorial period and decided to organize political and cultural events such as a remembrance meeting and seminar in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de agradecimiento de ex ministro de Defensa de URSS
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de agradecimiento de ex ministro de Defensa de URSS
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de agradecimiento que le enviara el dia 9 el mariscal Yazov, ex ministro de Defensa de la URSS.
					La misiva senala:
					
					El mas estimado camarada Kim Jong Un, 
					
					Quisiera llegarle a Vd. mi sincero agradecimiento por haberme enviado la carta personal de felicitacion, el regalo y el cesto de flores mas excelente con motivo de mi 90o cumpleanos. 
					
					Estamos muy conmovidos yo mismo y mis familiares por el hecho de que Vd. envio especialmente una delegacion de alto nivel encabezada por el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Aprecio mucho las relaciones particulares enlazadas con el gran camarada Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Hoy dia, Vd. presta profunda atencion a mi y al desarrollo de las relaciones entre Rusia y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Camarada Kim Jong Un, Mariscal de la RPDC,
					
					Le hago llegar una vez mas mi sincero agradecimiento. 
					
					Le deseo de todo corazon buena salud y exitos en su trabajo para levantar un Estado prospero socialista materializando el legado del gran  Camarada Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Con mas sublime homenaje y mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Pesista coreana gana medalla de oro en campeonato mundial de 2014
articles.content:
Pesista coreana gana medalla de oro en campeonato mundial de 2014
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La pesista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Jong Hwa, obtuvo una medalla de oro en la division de 58kg (f) del Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas de 2014.
					En la competencia efectuada el dia 11, Ri ocupo el primer lugar en el estilo envion al levantar 133kg y se ubico en el segundo puesto en el total.
					
					En la competencia del dia 10, su compatriota Kim Myong Hyok ocupo tercer lugar en el envion y en el total de la division de 69kg (m).

articles.title: Se impulsa en RPDC creacion de zonas de desarrollo economico
articles.content:
Se impulsa en RPDC creacion de zonas de desarrollo economico
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) ? A lo largo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea estan en marcha los proyectos para crear las zonas de desarrollo economico donde se conceden prerrogativas a las actividades economicas.
					El subtitular de la Direccion General Estatal de Desarrollo Economico del Ministerio de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Yun Yong Sok, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC decidio crear las zonas de desarrollo economico en 12 provincias (ciudades subordinadas directamente al centro) con el proposito de contribuir al desarrollo economico del pais y la mejora de vida del pueblo y ampliar el intercambio economico con otros paises.
					
					Algunas partes del capitalino municipio de Unjong, la ciudad de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y el distrito de Kangryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur fueron declaradas como zona de desarrollo de tecnologias de punta, zona economica internacional y zona verde ejemplar internacional.
					
					Unas porciones de la ciudad de Chongjin de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, la de Hyesan de la provincia de Ryanggang, la de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte fueron definidas como zonas de desarrollo economico.
					
					Se hicieron zonas de desarrollo industrial algunas partes de la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, la de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon, el distrito de Wiwon de la provincia de Jagang y el barrio de Chongnam de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					Quedaron determinados como zonas de desarrollo agricola los segmentos del distrito de Orang de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, el de Pukchong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y el de Sukchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur. 
					
					Algunas porciones de la ciudad de Songrim de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte y el municipio de Waudo de la ciudad de Nampho fueron fijadas como zonas de elaboracion para la exportacion.
					
					Ademas de la recien inaugurada zona de desarrollo turistico de Chongsu, se crearan las zonas de este tipo en algunas partes del distrito de Onsong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y el de Sinphyong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					
					El desarrollo de esas zonas estara a cargo de la compania independiente o la asociada que se fundaran segun el acuerdo entre la empresa coreana correspondiente y la firma o inversionista de otros paises.
					
					Las empresas y los inversionistas de otros paises podran escoger las zonas de desarrollo que les convengan y realizar en ellas las actividades economicas y comerciales en diversos dominios, entre otros, industria, agricultura y turismo.
					
					Las zonas de desarrollo economico de la RPDC con favorables condiciones naturales y geograficas despiertan gran interes de los gobiernos e inversionistas de varios paises asiaticos y europeos.

articles.title: Direccion de Kim Jong Un es fuerza de Corea, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Direccion de Kim Jong Un es fuerza de Corea, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun, en el articulo de la Redaccion publicado hoy, apunta que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un es la gran fuerza de la potencia del monte Paektu que marcha con el vigor de la juventud, y continua:
					El Partido del Trabajo de Corea guiado por el Mariscal orientara a la senda de victorias la patria y la revolucion y realizara sin falta todos los suenos e ideales del pueblo en esta tierra.
					
					La direccion del PTC es la fuerza motriz que abre la ruta de avance de la revolucion coreana registrando saltos y cambios y el medio todopoderoso para acelerar el triunfo final de la batalla de defensa del socialismo.
					
					La nueva centuria de la Corea del Juche es el camino no transitado en que se debe superar multiples pruebas.
					
					Determinar bien el camino a seguir es el problema fundamental que decide la victoria o la derrota y el avance o el retroceso de la revolucion coreana.
					
					La inspeccion a la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del Ejercito Popular de Corea, realizada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un con motivo del Ano Nuevo de 2012, fue el evento historico que indico la ruta a seguir por la epoca y la revolucion.
					
					La escogida del camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo garantiza la victoria eterna y el desarrollo vertiginoso de la Corea del Juche.
					
					La lucha por defender el socialismo al estilo coreano en el nuevo siglo, es el enfrentamiento total con el imperialismo en todas las ramas de la vida social. En esa batalla se movilizan todas las fuerzas espirituales y materiales del Estado.
					
					La direccion del PTC, que logra victorias sucesivas controlando a las fuerzas agresoras imperialistas, es la fuerza invencible que asegura la defensa del socialismo.
					
					El amor al pueblo es la cualidad noble del Mariscal y la naturaleza del PTC.
					
					La potencia no es la que tiene montones de riquezas o armamentos sofisticados, sino el pais donde se desborda el amor por el pueblo.
					
					Investirse de todas las glorias apoyando la direccion del Mariscal es la ferrea voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					La direccion apoyada por el pueblo es la maxima justicia y la mayor fuerza.
					
					La nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il avanzaran con dinamismo hacia la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.

articles.title: Minju Joson demanda cese de simulacro Hoguk en Sur de Corea

Minju Joson demanda cese de simulacro Hoguk en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual divulgado este miercoles, el periodico Minju Joson critica que los ejercicios belicos de gran envergadura Hoguk que los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan  a partir del dia 10 devienen una provocacion premeditada para agravar mas la confrontacion militar entre ambas partes coreanas y romper completamente las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					Cada vez que los titeres surcoreanos libraban el simulacro Hoguk y otros ejercicios belicos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se agravaba el enfrentamiento militar Norte-Sur y se creaba el inminente peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, revela el comentario y continua: 
					
					Sin embargo, la camarilla titere surcoreana despliega freneticamente el simulacro Hoguk bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la "provocacion local y guerra total del Norte". 
					
					Ya el segundo cuerpo del ejercito surcoreano entro en el entrenamiento de movilidad nocturna en las zonas de Chunchon y Hwachon de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea. El octavo cuerpo tambien libra los ejercicios de aplicacion del plan operacional en los alrededores de 6 ciudades y distritos litorales de la misma provincia y otros cuerpos se incorporan al simulacro. 
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que no se extendera a la parte Norte la chispa del alboroto belico de los belicistas surcoreanos que se desarrolla en todas las regiones cerca  de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar. 
					
					En ese caso, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos castigaran despiadadamente a los enemigos,  como ya habiamos advertido.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben reflexionar sobre la gravedad de la situacion y parar de inmediato el simulacro aventurero Hoguk.
